column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Bring the Right Quality to Human Life
#Text=We all have our own rights to do things that we want to do but do we make the right choice if we do it ?
#Text=If you want to bring the right quality to human life , here are some steps you can use as a guide .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Be friendly to others .
#Text=We all have to be friendly to each other .
#Text=We are all the same , all human , but all different to each other and being different is a good thing .
#Text=We do n't even look the same , so our personalities are all different too .
#Text=We ca n't judge someone because they are different from us .
#Text=Think about what would happen if everyone was the same ?
#Text=Would our life be interesting ?
#Text=Would their be anything different in life to learn ?
#Text=Help others .
#Text=We should all help each other if we see others are struggling with things .
#Text=Imagine you had something that you were struggling with and no one to help you .
#Text=What would you do ?
#Text=How would you do it ?
#Text=Will it work if you are doing what you are doing ?
#Text=Take care of those in special need .
#Text=We should all try to go to visit someone who is in hospital and take care of this we know that are ill or in pain .
#Text=Think how it feels to be all alone without any friends when you are suffering .
#Text=Would you like it if no one came to visit you ?
#Text=Do n't let others risk their lives .
#Text=Someone is drowning .
#Text=What do you do ?

#Text=( You think of anything that will save them , the best thing that will save them would be some think that floats ) throw them a floating hoop , if there is nothing that floats go and dive to save them .
#Text=Never break the laws .
#Text=Like stealing , killing someone , rape etc.
#Text=These are the worst things that you could do in life to someone .
#Text=Be happy with the things in life .
#Text=If you are not happy , think why are you not happy .
#Text=Think how can you improve it or do it ?
#Text=Will I be able to do it ?
#Text=If you ca n't do it think to yourself that you are lucky for the things you have that some people might not have ?
#Text=Be a better person .
#Text=Some people do mean things because of how they were treated when they where younger .
#Text=But you can change your life into a better life then being mean .
#Text=We all have good and bad things in us .
#Text=Find yourself some good friends to hang around with , to play basketball , go to the cinema , go to the club and shopping .
#Text=Understand that some people steal because they take drugs .
#Text=There is a good drug called the African Iboga plant .
#Text=But it costs a lot of money .
#Text=If you could make this for free this would change the whole world .
#Text=Imagine a place where no one takes drugs , does n't smoke and does n't have any silly habits .
#Text=There will be less criminal things happening around the world like killing , stealing , etc.
#Text=People do n't do things without a reasons there is a reason to why people do it .
#Text=Encourage children to meditate .
#Text=People should make every child do meditation .
#Text=In schools they should teach them how to relax .
#Text=If somebody really wants to something bad they could meditate and relax and not do anything bad at all but instead , go and do something nice .
#Text=In schools they should do a relaxation room where they do meditation .
#Text=If someone gets bullied they could go and meditate to make themselves feel better .
#Text=It might be a good idea if they teach children about differences .
#Text=Learn and teach self defence .
#Text=They should teach children how to protect themselves from bullies and how to react and not react .
#Text=There are some reaction that could make a bully want to bully you even more .
#Text=Go and read some articles about bullying .
#Text=They should teach children some stuff from wikiHow .
